start.text: We have been virtuous. This shall not trouble us.
Ludd is with us. We shall prevail.
Through the stars and into the breach...

start_boss.text: Not quite where I thought faith would lead me...
*sigh*... If this is the task to be done.

retreat.text: We should go. This is too dangerous.
Be swift. Loitering here is dangerous.

engaged.text: Violence should not be the answer, yet they chose it.

need_help.text: There's no shame in asking for help- so please, send it!
Come to my aid! I beseeche thee!

out_of_missiles.text: The ammo racks have been emptied...

pursuing.text: Follow them! Show them the error of their ways!
They try to run - but we cannot allow it.
Perhaps, this time violence is justified.

running.text: There's something to be said for living another day.
Away we go, out from this battlefield...
Ludd's protection shall not last forever.

hull_90.text: The armoring is cracked, and my hull is scratched up.
The faithful have begun damage control.
The integrity of our ship is down to 90%.

hull_50.text: Ludd believed in us! We can keep fighting!

hull_30.text: Our hull is at 30% and falling!
Faith has held us here long enough!

overload.text: Damnable ship and its weak vents.
The conduits are leaking flux! Cease fire!

death.text: Abandon ship! Ludd cares not for fools!

victory.text: I do abhor violence, but we seem to have made it through again.
Here's hoping that we can avoid such brutality in the future.

victory_boss.text: Ludd has challenged us today, and we have succeeded.
